name: Dinner cruise spectacle by Bonsai Cruise
description: The Bonsai Legacy is a re-creation of an Indochinese inspired river vessel - a throwback to the past. The all new river ship “BONSAI Legacy” has a main deck with interactive cooking stations & buffet dinner with fusion signature dishes which follows its slogan “my palate, my cruise, my experience” all complimented by an authentic contemporary live entertainment program . The upper deck will be the perfect getaway for those seeking a romantic night out. The Bonsai Legacy will also boast a private lounge, complete with an alfresco terrace.
